languages.text: "Ваши аргументы тверды, Вольный Торговец. Но даже если вы правы насчет префекта, это еще не означает вашу полную невиновность".
"There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."
languages.original_text: "Ваши аргументы тверды, Вольный Торговец. Но даже если вы правы насчет префекта, это еще не означает вашу полную невиновность".

traits.locale_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."
"There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

"There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

languages.text: «Hay verdad en sus argumentos, Comerciante Independiente, pero, incluso aunque tenga razón sobre la prefecta, eso no cambia todas las acusaciones en su contra».
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: «Hay verdad en sus argumentos, Comerciante Independiente, pero, incluso aunque tenga razón sobre la prefecta, eso no cambia todas las acusaciones en su contra».

languages.text: “你的论点很有说服力，行商浪人。不过，就算你对行政官的判断是正确的，你也无法立刻推翻针对你的所有指控。”
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: “你的论点很有说服力，行商浪人。不过，就算你对行政官的判断是正确的，你也无法立刻推翻针对你的所有指控。”

languages.text: 「ご意見には一理あります、ローグトレーダー。しかし、総監についてのあなたの意見が正しかったとしても、それだけであなたに対するすべての疑いが即座に晴れるわけではありません」
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: 「ご意見には一理あります、ローグトレーダー。しかし、総監についてのあなたの意見が正しかったとしても、それだけであなたに対するすべての疑いが即座に晴れるわけではありません」

languages.text: "Eure Argumente sind gewichtig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber selbst wenn Ihr bezüglich der Präfektin recht hättet, entkräftet das nicht sofort alle Anschuldigungen gegen Euch."
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Argumente sind gewichtig, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber selbst wenn Ihr bezüglich der Präfektin recht hättet, entkräftet das nicht sofort alle Anschuldigungen gegen Euch."

languages.text: "İddialarınızda haksız değilsiniz Hür Tacir. Ancak prefektin hareketleri konusunda haklı olsanız bile bu durum, size yöneltilen tüm suçlamaları bir anda ortadan kaldırmaz."
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: "İddialarınızda haksız değilsiniz Hür Tacir. Ancak prefektin hareketleri konusunda haklı olsanız bile bu durum, size yöneltilen tüm suçlamaları bir anda ortadan kaldırmaz."

languages.text: « Je reconnais le bien-fondé de vos arguments, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais même si vous avez raison à propos de la préfète, cela n'infirme pas immédiatement toutes les accusations portées contre vous. »
languages.original_text: "There is weight to your arguments, Rogue Trader. But even if you are right about the prefect, that does not immediately disprove all accusations against you."

traits.locale_text: « Je reconnais le bien-fondé de vos arguments, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais même si vous avez raison à propos de la préfète, cela n'infirme pas immédiatement toutes les accusations portées contre vous. »
